languages.text: "Да, о да, {name}. Я боялась, что мой мир зачахнет за это время. Превратиться в пустыню или порастет сорной травой. Но то, что я увидела, меня поистине восхитило".
"Yes, oh yes, {name}. I was afraid that my world would wither during this time. That it would turn into a desert or become overgrown with weeds. But what I saw left me truly delighted."
languages.original_text: "Да, о да, {name}. Я боялась, что мой мир зачахнет за это время. Превратиться в пустыню или порастет сорной травой. Но то, что я увидела, меня поистине восхитило".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, oh yes, {name}. I was afraid that my world would wither during this time. That it will turn into a desert or gets overgrown with weeds. But the view had left me truly delighted."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes, oh yes, {name}. I was afraid that my world would wither during this time. That it will turn into a desert or gets overgrown with weeds. But the view had left me truly delighted."

traits.locale_text: "Yes, oh yes, {name}. I was afraid that my world would wither during this time. That it would turn into a desert or become overgrown with weeds. But what I saw left me truly delighted."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes, oh yes, {name}. I was afraid that my world would wither during this time. That it would turn into a desert or become overgrown with weeds. But what I saw left me truly delighted."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes, oh yes, {name}. I was afraid that my world would wither during this time. That it would turn into a desert or become overgrown with weeds. But what I saw left me truly delighted."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “真的是太好了，{name}。我本担心在这段时间里，我的世界会逐渐枯萎。花园凋零为荒漠，杂草丛生，可我看到的一切却令我发自真心地快乐。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, oh yes, {name}. I was afraid that my world would wither during this time. That it would turn into a desert or become overgrown with weeds. But what I saw left me truly delighted."

traits.locale_text: “真的是太好了，{name}。我本担心在这段时间里，我的世界会逐渐枯萎。花园凋零为荒漠，杂草丛生，可我看到的一切却令我发自真心地快乐。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Sí, oh sí, {name}. Tenía miedo de que mi mundo se agostase durante este tiempo. Que se hubiese transformado en un desierto o estuviese cubierto por la maleza. Pero estoy encantada con lo que he visto».
languages.original_text: "Yes, oh yes, {name}. I was afraid that my world would wither during this time. That it would turn into a desert or become overgrown with weeds. But what I saw left me truly delighted."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, oh sí, {name}. Tenía miedo de que mi mundo se agostase durante este tiempo. Que se hubiese transformado en un desierto o estuviese cubierto por la maleza. Pero estoy encantada con lo que he visto».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Oui, {name} ! J'avais peur que mon monde ait périclité après tout ce temps, qu'il se soit transformé en un désert aride ou qu'il soit envahi par les mauvaises herbes, mais ce que j'y ai vu m'a profondément ravie. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, oh yes, {name}. I was afraid that my world would wither during this time. That it would turn into a desert or become overgrown with weeds. But what I saw left me truly delighted."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, {name} ! J'avais peur que mon monde ait périclité après tout ce temps, qu'il se soit transformé en un désert aride ou qu'il soit envahi par les mauvaises herbes, mais ce que j'y ai vu m'a profondément ravie. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ja, ja, {name}. Ich hatte befürchtet, meine Welt wäre in der Zwischenzeit dahingeschwunden. Dass sie zu einer Wüste geworden wäre oder Unkraut sie überwuchert hätte. Aber was ich erblickte, hat mich überglücklich gemacht."
languages.original_text: "Yes, oh yes, {name}. I was afraid that my world would wither during this time. That it would turn into a desert or become overgrown with weeds. But what I saw left me truly delighted."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, ja, {name}. Ich hatte befürchtet, meine Welt wäre in der Zwischenzeit dahingeschwunden. Dass sie zu einer Wüste geworden wäre oder Unkraut sie überwuchert hätte. Aber was ich erblickte, hat mich überglücklich gemacht."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、そう、そうだ、{name}。我は今度こそ、自分の世界が枯れてしまうのではないかと恐れていた。砂漠のようになってしまうのではないか、雑草が生い茂ってしまうのではないかと。しかし、実際に目に映ったものは、心から喜べるものだった」
languages.original_text: "Yes, oh yes, {name}. I was afraid that my world would wither during this time. That it would turn into a desert or become overgrown with weeds. But what I saw left me truly delighted."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、そう、そうだ、{name}。我は今度こそ、自分の世界が枯れてしまうのではないかと恐れていた。砂漠のようになってしまうのではないか、雑草が生い茂ってしまうのではないかと。しかし、実際に目に映ったものは、心から喜べるものだった」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yes, oh yes, . I was afraid that my world would wither during this time. That it would turn into a desert or become overgrown with weeds. But what I saw left me truly delighted."

languages.text: "Öyle tabii {name}. Dünyamın bunca zaman içinde solup gitmesinden korkuyordum. Çöle döneceğini ya da yabani otlarla dolacağını sanıyordum. Fakat gördüklerim beni çok mutlu etti."
languages.original_text: "Yes, oh yes, {name}. I was afraid that my world would wither during this time. That it would turn into a desert or become overgrown with weeds. But what I saw left me truly delighted."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle tabii {name}. Dünyamın bunca zamanda solup gideceğinden korkuyordum. Bir çöle döneceğini ya da yabani otlarla dolacağını sanıyordum. Fakat gördüklerim beni çok mutlu etti."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
